item.title: Ring Of Recoil Error
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

i tried to add ring of recoil into client.java under public boolean attack () {
but i got 5 errors

here is my code

if (AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2550) { int recoilDam = (int) ((double) (hitDiff) * .10); player.hitDiff = recoilDam; player.hitUpdateRequired = true; player.updateRequired = true; player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

and here are the errors

client.java:24908: cannot find symbol symbol : variable AttackingOn2 location: class client if (AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2550) { ^ client.java:24910: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.hitDiff = recoilDam; ^ client.java:24911: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:24912: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:24913: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 5 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

can someone please help me
